displayName.description: The displayable name of the company.

capabilities.description: A list of capabilities assigned to this company. The current valid set is: {'detect_face','detect_gun','forensic_search', 'detect_scene_change', 'vehicle_analytics', 'vehicle_analytics.embeddings', 'person_analytics', 'person_analytics.embeddings', 'scene_classification', 'multiple_risk_analysis'}

daysToRetainData.description: The number of days to retain alarm and chip data for this company. This includes alarm and chip images and the associated analysis result, if applicable. Setting this to 0 means that no images will be stored on MCAP.
